attributes.name: Range
attributes.description: The maximum distance the weapon can target in inches.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The type of weapon, such as Rapid Fire, Heavy, Assault, or Pistol.

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: The weapon's power to wound a target.

attributes.name: Armor Penetration
attributes.description: The amount by which the weapon reduces the target's save roll.

attributes.name: Damage
attributes.description: The amount of damage dealt by a successful hit.
